thread.section_title: Ibis London Euston St Pancras - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ideal!
thread.title_full: Ideal! - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RacheeVee
title: Ideal!
text:
Stayed overnight at this hotel which was chosen for its close proximity to Euston Station, low price and facilities available at the hotel. We weren't disappointed. The hotel was convenient for railway and underground stations, trams and buses. It was modern with excellent breakfast facilities and caring., helpful staff.
Room Tip: Nothing I can think of. See more room tips Green Features: Not sure but breakfast had some very healthy choices.
